tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_69: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'The Inevitable Reality -',verse: 5193,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'What is the Inevitable Reality?',verse: 5194,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'And what can make you know what is the Inevitable Reality?',verse: 5195,},ayah_4: {image: '',text: 'Thamud and 'Aad denied the Striking Calamity.',verse: 5196,},ayah_5: {image: '',text: 'So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast].',verse: 5197,},ayah_6: {image: '',text: 'And as for 'Aad, they were destroyed by a screaming, violent wind',verse: 5198,},ayah_7: {image: '',text: 'Which Allah imposed upon them for seven nights and eight days in succession, so you would see the people therein fallen as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees.',verse: 5199,},ayah_8: {image: '',text: 'Then do you see of them any remains?',verse: 5200,},ayah_9: {image: '',text: 'And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin.',verse: 5201,},ayah_10: {image: '',text: 'And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding [in severity].',verse: 5202,},ayah_11: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship',verse: 5203,},ayah_12: {image: '',text: 'That We might make it for you a reminder and [that] a conscious ear would be conscious of it.',verse: 5204,},ayah_13: {image: '',text: 'Then when the Horn is blown with one blast',verse: 5205,},ayah_14: {image: '',text: 'And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow -',verse: 5206,},ayah_15: {image: '',text: 'Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur,',verse: 5207,},ayah_16: {image: '',text: 'And the heaven will split [open], for that Day it is infirm.',verse: 5208,},ayah_17: {image: '',text: 'And the angels are at its edges. And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day, eight [of them].',verse: 5209,},ayah_18: {image: '',text: 'That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed.',verse: 5210,},ayah_19: {image: '',text: 'So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record!',verse: 5211,},ayah_20: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account."',verse: 5212,},ayah_21: {image: '',text: 'So he will be in a pleasant life -',verse: 5213,},ayah_22: {image: '',text: 'In an elevated garden,',verse: 5214,},ayah_23: {image: '',text: 'Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near.',verse: 5215,},ayah_24: {image: '',text: '[They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you put forth in the days past."',verse: 5216,},ayah_25: {image: '',text: 'But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "Oh, I wish I had not been given my record',verse: 5217,},ayah_26: {image: '',text: 'And had not known what is my account.',verse: 5218,},ayah_27: {image: '',text: 'I wish my death had been the decisive one.',verse: 5219,},ayah_28: {image: '',text: 'My wealth has not availed me.',verse: 5220,},ayah_29: {image: '',text: 'Gone from me is my authority."',verse: 5221,},ayah_30: {image: '',text: '[ Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him.',verse: 5222,},ayah_31: {image: '',text: 'Then into Hellfire drive him.',verse: 5223,},ayah_32: {image: '',text: 'Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him."',verse: 5224,},ayah_33: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great,',verse: 5225,},ayah_34: {image: '',text: 'Nor did he encourage the feeding of the poor.',verse: 5226,},ayah_35: {image: '',text: 'So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend',verse: 5227,},ayah_36: {image: '',text: 'Nor any food except from the discharge of wounds;',verse: 5228,},ayah_37: {image: '',text: 'None will eat it except the sinners.',verse: 5229,},ayah_38: {image: '',text: 'So I swear by what you see',verse: 5230,},ayah_39: {image: '',text: 'And what you do not see',verse: 5231,},ayah_40: {image: '',text: '[That] indeed, the Qur'an is the word of a noble Messenger.',verse: 5232,},ayah_41: {image: '',text: 'And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe.',verse: 5233,},ayah_42: {image: '',text: 'Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember.',verse: 5234,},ayah_43: {image: '',text: '[It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.',verse: 5235,},ayah_44: {image: '',text: 'And if Muhammad had made up about Us some [false] sayings,',verse: 5236,},ayah_45: {image: '',text: 'We would have seized him by the right hand;',verse: 5237,},ayah_46: {image: '',text: 'Then We would have cut from him the aorta.',verse: 5238,},ayah_47: {image: '',text: 'And there is no one of you who could prevent [Us] from him.',verse: 5239,},ayah_48: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder for the righteous.',verse: 5240,},ayah_49: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, We know that among you are deniers.',verse: 5241,},ayah_50: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, it will be [a cause of] regret upon the disbelievers.',verse: 5242,},ayah_51: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, it is the truth of certainty.',verse: 5243,},ayah_52: {image: '',text: 'So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.',verse: 5244,},name: surah_69,};
